评论详情: Previous reviews said the purse is very stiff, they are correct, however, I plan to carry while wearing a football jersey, therefore I won’t need anything but phone, lipstick and coins. That’s about all you can put in it. I have several of the higher price brand, this copy is very close. I was concerned that the orange would be a more yellow orange but it is a true orange. Very satisfied with the color.

This little shiny black croco bag is very stylish, looks expensive and I got it at a great price. Makes you look good. The only downside is it’s a little stiff and you can get only a few things in it. But the look of the bag is just great. I love it. Thinking about getting another color.

Although this purse is faux leather, the surface really looks like my genuine Brahmin bags.  Of course, the gold tag without the Brahmin lettering is a dead give away, but from a distance, i doubt it is noticeable.  I ended up returning it just because it was smaller than I had anticipated and the hot pink color has a bit of a purple hue to it that I did not like.  But for the price, it is worth trying.
Love it!  It looks like I spent a lot more for it!  Great value for the money. Very stylish!!! The quality is amazing.
I like this purse very much, however the size is too small. Great for key and a tiny wallet.  Great quality and value for the money.
Looks just like a bramin
This is a super cute bag . However I will warn you that it is super tough and doesn’t bend. Not soft leather whatsoever. But hopefully in time it will loosen up.
Strap too fat
Got 2 different colors for the summer. It is difficult to get in and out of due to design. Interior is not soft like Brahmin. But very good fake purse
I’m so impressed!

This purchase was to be a Christmas gift, upon arrival love it so much decided to keep it, looks expensive, well made , good size will hold large phone, keys, lipstick, a few small items such as hand sanitizer . Very stylish and a plus because I have Pierre Dumas slides in crocodile brown that will match very well. A purchase I recommend this crossbody because plus the price was a bargain and perfect fall purse.

Guy's who design this purse did excellent job! I own same kind of purse from more expensive brand, but... This one has zipper added and little bit a bigger size! Love it! Someone was know what doing for sure! 5 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ star. It is my second one, I got a purple color too, beautiful ❤️
A cute little purse for travel I love the color
such a cute purse, love the material
I like the colors I chose and the size is ideal for my needs.

评论概述: This is a beautiful little crossbody purse that holds everything you need!!
评论详情: This high quality, well made crocodile embossed crossbody bag is big enough to hold your phone keys a lip gloss and credit cards license literally anything you need. It looks great for either everyday use or a night out on the town. It's an excellent value for the money and it should be a staple in your wardrobe!!! #FoundItOnAmazon

I own two of these bags made by the expensive brand name company, and this one is almost identical! I got this one in black for occasional use, because I use my (brand name) blue one most days. It’s the perfect size for my iPhone 14 and a thin card holder, plus a few other items. I prefer a small purse for the necessities as I’ve gotten older. I’m tired of carrying big heavy purses around. It’s great to downsize with this purse!

评论概述: Beautiful but a little too stiff
评论详情: I think I have to carry this bag a couple a times to "break it in".It's really stiff but this bag is so gorgeous. The picture doesn't give it enough justice. There's also not much you can carry in the bag because it's really small. I can't carry my small card holder/coin purse inside it. I put my ID and cards and my phone, lipgloss, lipstick, a small pack of tissue, and a pen. That's pretty much that can hold in there. Besides that the bag is really really beautiful.
I had to return it only  to purchase a different color perfect size.

评论用户: Just A Girl That Loves Her Dogs
评论详情: This little crossbody is cute. This is much cheaper than the brand name and the product reflects that. So you should not expect a name-brand product with this handbag. It is well-made and durable. Great for weddings.

评论概述: This is such a beautiful crocodile embossed crossbody
评论详情: OMG I love this black purse, I love how the depth is vertical instead of horizontal, most bags are horizontal but with this one being vertical it allows you to put your hand in and find exactly what you're looking for. The long strap allows you to put it across your body and it has a nice little magnet snap in the front where there are pockets. If you need to put things extra in areas, you're able to it's about a size that you can put a few things in it like your purse some money maybe even a small wallet it's really nice

评论概述: Worth the price, but doesn't feel like leather
评论详情: This looks good and you can't tell it from a more expensive bag, but it feels more like plastic that leather, which makes sense since vegan leather is made from plastic.  It's a good size for your phone, credit cards, cash and a few other small items.

I like this bag! It is a bit stiff and inflexible, but that aside--it looks great and seems very solid and durable.  It fits a cell phone, lip colors, and other small items with no issues. I love the style and the fact that it is one that can be used when dressing up for a work event, a wedding, etc.  Despite the stiffness, I would order it over again based on the style.
While this is VERY cute, it is very hard to get inside the bag to get to your items and to get things out. I really like but it’s not practical at all…

Item arrived in two days, nicely packed and wrapped.  On opening, the PE material used to make the bag was actually sticky to the touch.  The exterior of the bag picked up dust and anything else it came in contact with.  I understand that it's a rendition of a much more expensive bag, but it just didn't impress due to the difficulty of keeping it clean and nice.
The purse is perfect in appearance and size.  Great price too :)
The size is convenient n smart, but the strap is not tall girl length friendly.
Very stiff too hard to open you get what you pay for had to send it back
This is a cute knock off of a really well-known brand love the color and the feel. Fantastic buy

Pleasantly surprised. I have several of the high end designer name bags with this crock design and the similar style  bag in that brand is $145  …. Didn’t really want to pay that for a small bag that I wasn’t sure I would use. This is perfect. Holds ID, credit cards, cash, phone , lipstick and sunglasses. All I need it to. It’s a keeper and at under $25 it was a steal. Buy one.
Perfect for when you just need your phone and keys!  Looks just as good as my very expensive Brahmin. Great dupe.  Arrived on time.  Very pleased.
